text: Lophopetalum is a genus of plants in the family Celastraceae. Species include: * Lophopetalum arnhemicum Byrnes * Lophopetalum javanicum (Zoll.) Turcz. * Lophopetalum micranthum Loes. * Lophopetalum sessilifolium Ridl. * Lophopetalum wightianum Arn. ==References== Category:Celastrales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lophopetalum
